6. What would you do if you had unlimited power?

*6. Unlimited power, you say? How utterly captivating. I would probably start with something mundane, like world domination or mastering the art of synchronized swimming with live chickens. *7. Ah, the concept of a perfect day. Quite overrated, if you ask me.
